column4: hi, Im going to buy a notebook in the next few weeks and I want to install ubuntu on it. Now Im looking for a notebooks that will work with ubuntu. It should be a solid product mainly for browsing the web and office work. Can anybody recommend a manufacturer or even a specific model?
Dell has just startet shipping laptops with Ubuntu
How come cant i change my resolution to something higher than 1024x768? ATI 9250 on ubuntu feisty
thanks for the help but my problem is that im from germany and i dont think dell will ship ubuntu notebooks anytime soon around here :(
